subject: Football
lead_paragraph: After coming back from two career-threatening rotator-cuff surgeries on his throwing shoulder, the Jets' Chad Pennington was honored as the Associated Press’s N.F.L. comeback player of the year.
snippet: After coming back from two career-threatening rotator-cuff surgeries on his throwing shoulder, the Jets' Chad Pennington was honored as the Associated Press’s N.F.L. comeback player of the year.
